sentences.sentence: Some, Sometimes, Often, Usually, Ordinarily, Customarily, Most, Mostly.
sentences.translation: 一些，一些时候，经常地，通常地，普通地很多时候。

sentences.sentence: When a node is not relevant, any associated controls customarily will be hidden.
sentences.translation: 如果节点不是相关的，那么通常会隐藏任何关联的控件。

sentences.sentence: When it is started by the ESC character itself (customarily just for hardware), or
sentences.translation: 当字符串以ESC字符本身开始时(习惯上是针对硬件)，或者
